titles.title: Responsible Transfer of Firearms Act
A bill to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to promote the responsible transfer of firearms.
Responsible Transfer of Firearms Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Responsible Transfer of Firearms Act
This bill amends the federal criminal code to make it a crime to sell or transfer a firearm to prohibited person, unless the transferor takes reasonable steps to determine that the recipient is not prohibited from firearm possession. (Current law makes it a crime to sell or transfer a firearm to a prohibited person if the transferor knows or has reasonable cause to believe the recipient is prohibited from firearm possession.)
